summary: This is the story of Giant The Nord and his travels with The Dovahkiin. Giant is a follower located in Riverwood near the mill. He Carries a Giant's Club and Dragon Bone armor (excluding the helmet). Activate his inventory to make him where the armor this is a bug.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]This is the story of Giant The Nord and his travels with The Dovahkiin. Giant is a follower located in Riverwood near the mill. He Carries a Giant's Club and Dragon Bone armor (excluding the helmet). Activate his inventory to make him where the armor this is a bug.[/size]

[size=3]LORE: Giant The Nord was originally name Small he was a small kid. Till the day he stumbled upon a club that transformed him to a Giant he was then called Giant and for no confusion was Called Giant The Nord so he wasn't mistaken for a actual Giant. He was rejected by society where he went to live with The Giants of Pale Till he came upon a Dragon called ViingaalRiil (AKA Winged Monster) Who killed the Giants he then Ripped out its bones and made armor out of it 100's of years ago still rejected by society he sits near Riverwood.[/size]
[u]
[size=4]I Recomend You Get Extencive Follower Framework Mod to Have More Than 1 Follower - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D12933%26preview%3D&pUp=1[/size][/u][/b]
author: Ryeguy2001
